attributes.action: Give NHS workers bonuses for  COVID 19 services
attributes.additional_details:
Footballers and actors are overpaid and yet our heroes who risked 
their lives on a daily basis dont get any recognition besides a clap on thursday, can we not do more than that!
attributes.background: Give NHS front workers bonus as a gesture recognition and appreciation for their essential service during the pandemic

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions: 

Increase pay for NHS healthcare workers and recognise their work: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300073  

Give NHS staff a one off bonus for their help with Covid 19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/321150 

Reward our healthcare heroes now for risking their lives to fight Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/318741
